text: @WhiteHouse TRUMP turning the Press Conference into a Campaign rally. TRUMP boasting how everyone especially News Stations are Fake News he did everything perfectly about covid19 HA HA Rubbish TRUMP is on tv for Months down playing covid19 and doing nothing. TRUMP is GUILTY
